message: “Human trafficking is something that is a pervasive problem in our society,” said Goodlatte, a Virginia Republican. “I think most Americans know about human trafficking, but they allow them to have it in their minds as a kind of international thing … It is in every community and it takes many, many different forms.”

data.description: When Lititz-based North Star Initiative opens its doors in a few weeks, it will become the first program in Lancaster County — and perhaps all of central Pennsylvania — to
data.title: Leaders and advocates discuss 'pervasive' human trafficking problem as Lititz-based restoration house prepares to open
